description: London’s tallest skyscraper, The Shard, was evacuated following reports of a fire Thursday, fire officials said.
title: Smoke Alarm at The Shard: London's Tallest Skyscraper Evacuated
title_page: Smoke Alarm at The Shard:  London's Tallest Skyscraper Evacuated
text:
Breaking News Emails Get breaking news alerts and special reports. The news and stories that matter, delivered weekday mornings.
London’s tallest skyscraper, The Shard, was evacuated following reports of a fire Thursday, fire officials said.
About 900 workers were led out of the 87-storey, 1,000 feet tall building after smoke was reported in the basement at about 10:30 a.m. local time (5:30 a.m. ET).
No injuries were reported and there was “no suggestion” that a fire was burning, the London Fire Brigade said in a statement.
Water was pumped into the basement and the smoke was dissipating, fire officials said.
